title: THOUGHT / SUICIDE COP
description: For when the thought is FIXED. Logic tries to get you to kill yourself if you have a gun and bullets, and tells you you're stupid if you don't.

dialogueTree.title: Pain Threshold: "Sounds like you're a potential Suic..."
dialogueTree.english: Sounds like you're a potential Suicide Cop! With his finger on the *eject* button. Ready to let go of this life! Guess what?
dialogueTree.polish: Zdaje się, że jesteś potencjalnym samobójczym gliną! Z palcem wiecznie spoczywającym na przycisku „wysuń taśmę”. Wiesz co?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Здаецца, ты патэнцыйны самагубца-паліцэйскі! З пальцам вечна націснутым на кнопку "высунуць стужку". Ведаеш што?

links.title: Pain Threshold: "One bullet should do the trick. You..."
links.english: One bullet should do the trick. You have the gun... and you have the bullet.
links.polish: Jedna kula powinna wystarczyć. Masz broń... i masz nabój.
links.belarusian: Адна куля павінна хапіць. У цябе ёсць зброя... і ў цябе ёсць патрон.

dialogueTree.title: Pain Threshold: "Sounds like you're the Suicide Cop!..."
dialogueTree.english: Sounds like you're the Suicide Cop! With his finger on the *eject* button. Ready to let go of this life! But guess what?
dialogueTree.polish: Zdaje się, że jesteś samobójczym gliną! Z palcem wiecznie spoczywającym na przycisku „wysuń taśmę”. I wiesz co?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Здаецца, ты самагубны міліцыянт! З вечна націсканым пальцам на кнопцы "выдаўзіць стужку". І ведаеш што?

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You idiot! You don't have any bulle..."
links.english: You idiot! You don't have any bullets!

links.title: Composure: "You've made such a big show out of..."
links.english: You've made such a big show out of it too. You feel like everyone basically *expects* you to do it now.
links.polish: I jeszcze urządziłeś z tego taki pokaz. Masz wrażenie, że wszyscy się teraz tego po tobie *spodziewają*.
links.belarusian: І яшчэ ўладкаваў з гэтага такі паказ. Маеш уражанне, што цяпер усе гэтага ад цябе *чакаюць*.

links.title: Volition: "What is this? You're not ready to d..."
links.english: What is this? You're not ready to die, this is garbage.
links.polish: Co to w ogóle ma znaczyć? Nie jesteś gotów na śmierć, to jakaś brednia.
links.belarusian: Што гэта наогул азначае? Ты не гатовы да смерці, гэта нейкая лухта.

links.title: Authority: "It *would* be the honourable thing..."
links.english: It *would* be the honourable thing to do. It would really show them. Show her too.
links.polish: To *byłoby* honorowe. Pokazałbyś im wszystkim. Jej też.
links.belarusian: Гэта *было б* ганарова. Ты паказаў бы ім усім. Ёй таксама.

links.title: You: "What a pity. Because that's totally..."
links.english: What a pity. Because that's totally *me*. Suicide Cop.
links.polish: Straszna szkoda. Bo to w stu procentach *ja*. Samobójczy glina.
links.belarusian: Вельмі шкада. Бо гэта на сто адсоткаў *я*. Самагубны паліцэйскі.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Oh yes. It would be so sweet to tas..."
links.english: Oh yes. It would be so sweet to taste the barrel once more. That sour metal...  maybe there *is* a way? Not yet. But stick with it -- keep going dark, and it'll finally *click*.
links.polish: O tak. Cudownie byłoby poczuć znowu smak lufy. Ten kwaśny metal... Może *jest* na to jakiś sposób? Jeszcze nie. Ale trzymaj się tego. Pozostań w mroku, a w końcu się to *stanie*.
links.belarusian: О так. Цудоўна было б ізноў адчуць смак ствала. Гэты кіслы метал... Магчыма, *ёсць* які-небудзь спосаб? Яшчэ няма. Але трымайся гэтага. Заставайся ў цемры, і нарэшце гэта *здзяйсніцца*.

links.title: You: "Suicide Cop *does* have a ring to i..."
links.english: Suicide Cop *does* have a ring to it. I should think about it -- but only a little.
links.polish: „Samobójczy glina” brzmi nawet nieźle. Powinienem to przemyśleć. Ale tylko trochę.
links.belarusian: "Суіцидальны паліцэйскі" гучыць нават нядрэнна. Мне варта гэта абдумаць. Але толькі крыху.

links.title: You: "Hmm... maybe I should. Yes. (Look a..."
links.english: Hmm... maybe I should. Yes. (Look at the gun and start thinking about it.)
links.polish: Hmm. Może powinienem. Tak. (Popatrz na broń i zacznij nad tym rozmyślać).
links.belarusian: Хмм. Магчыма, павінен. Так. (Паглядзі на зброю і пачні аб гэтым роздумваць).

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Oh yes. It would be so sweet to tas..."
links.english: Oh yes. It would be so sweet to taste the barrel once more. That sour metal...  Oh, but not yet. But stick with it -- keep going dark, and it'll finally *click*.
links.polish: O tak. Cudownie byłoby poczuć znowu smak lufy. Ten kwaśny metal... Lecz to jeszcze nie teraz. Ale trzymaj się tego. Pozostań w mroku, a w końcu się to *stanie*.
links.belarusian: О так. Цудоўна было б зноў адчуць смак ствала. Гэты кіслы метал... Але гэта яшчэ не зараз. Але трымайся гэтага. Застанься ў цемры, і ўрэшце гэта *адбудзецца*.

links.title: You: "No. It's a sign that I want to live..."
links.english: No. It's a sign that I want to live. (Refuse.)
links.polish: Nie. To znak, że chcę żyć. (Odmów).
links.belarusian: Не. Гэта знак, што я хачу жыць. (Адмовіць).

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Fine. Keep up the charade another d..."
links.english: Fine. Keep up the charade another day. This could have been so liberating, but you cling to the case, to your partner, to the world... it's pitiful.
links.polish: Dobrze. Urządzaj maskaradę przez kolejny dzień. To mogło być wielkie wyzwolenie, ale ty wolisz trzymać się śledztwa, partnera, świata... To żałosne.
links.belarusian: Добра. Уладкоўвай маскарад на працягу яшчэ аднаго дня. Гэта магло быць вялікае вызваленне, але ты аддаеш перавагу трымацца за расследаванне, партнёра, свет... Гэта жаласна.

dialogueTree.title: Pain Threshold: "Sounds like you're the Suicide Cop!..."
dialogueTree.english: Sounds like you're the Suicide Cop! With his finger on the *eject* button. Ready to let go of this life! But guess what?
dialogueTree.polish: Zdaje się, że jesteś samobójczym gliną! Z palcem wiecznie spoczywającym na przycisku „wysuń taśmę”. I wiesz co?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Здаецца, ты самагубчым копам! З пальцам вечна размешчаным на кнопцы "выцягніце стужку". І ведаеш што?

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You idiot! You've got the bullet, b..."
links.english: You idiot! You've got the bullet, but no gun!
links.polish: Durniu! Masz amunicję, ale broni już nie!
links.belarusian: Дурню! У цябе ёсць боепрыпасы, але зброі ўжо няма!

dialogueTree.title: Pain Threshold: "Sounds like you're the Suicide Cop!..."
dialogueTree.english: Sounds like you're the Suicide Cop! With his finger on the *eject* button. Ready to let go of this life! But guess what?
dialogueTree.polish: Zdaje się, że jesteś samobójczym gliną! Z palcem wiecznie spoczywającym na przycisku „wysuń taśmę”. I wiesz co?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Здаецца, што ты самагубны паліцыянт! Са сталым пальцам на кнопцы "высунуць стужку". І ведаеш што?

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You idiot! You don't have a gun or..."
links.english: You idiot! You don't have a gun or any bullets!
links.polish: Durniu! Nie masz broni ani amunicji!
links.belarusian: Дурню! У цябе няма зброі і амуніцыі!
